https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/yjQ37ItvpL6kzGa0bqBu8xifIpb.jpg Three strangers - Vishnu, Louis, Pappan - who are jailed due to various reasons become friends at the jail. Then they feel that their lost life is being regenerated. Once out of jail all three hope to lead a better life. 3 Dots
